data.what_is: Marketing 1by1 provides an adaptable marketing automation software that send customized communications with product recommendations according to each profile. The solution integrates all the input and output channels with ready to use triggers.
data.product_description: Marketing 1by1 provides an adaptable marketing automation software that send customized communications with product recommendations according to each profile. The solution integrates all the input and output channels with ready to use triggers.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about 1by1?
The intuitive and user-friendliness of the software

What do you dislike about 1by1?
Tends to get complex in stages. Some features are hard to understand

What problems is 1by1 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Made the work easier
Able to generate better insights
